trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of data bindings for a control.
trans-unit.target: 代表控件的数据绑定的集合。

trans-unit.source: Simple data binding is accomplished by adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加完成简单数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Any object that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class can access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 继承自任何对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类可以访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For a list of Windows controls that support data binding, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class.
trans-unit.target: 对于支持数据绑定的控件的窗口的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> contains standard collection methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>包含标准收集方法，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Clear%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To get the control that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> belongs to, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 为获得控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>属于中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Control%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> of five controls: four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>的五个控件： 四个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> 类的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> 属性来访问 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent" /> the binding collection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 绑定集合所属的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection" /> class with the specified bindable control.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的可绑定控件初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> 添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> 添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> created by this overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method is set to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>的此重载所创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>方法设置的值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs when the change is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged>时完成更改后发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> instance, and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method to add the instance to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>实例，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>方法将添加到实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="binding" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="binding" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> does not specify a valid column of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> 未指定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource" /> 的有效列。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control property to bind.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定的控件属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据源的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The property or list to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定到的属性或列表。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> using the specified control property name, data source, and data member, and adds it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的控件属性名、数据源和数据成员创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />，并将其添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> created by this overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method is set to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>的此重载所创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>方法设置的值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event to occur.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged>事件发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method to add three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>方法来添加三个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> 类的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> 属性来访问 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="binding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="binding" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="dataMember" /> doesn't specify a valid member of the <paramref name="dataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataMember" /> 未指定 <paramref name="dataSource" /> 的有效成员。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control property to bind.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定的控件属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the data source.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据源的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The property or list to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定到的属性或列表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to format the displayed data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />
trans-unit.target: 若要格式化显示的数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a binding with the specified control property name, data source, data member, and information about whether formatting is enabled, and adds the binding to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的控件属性名称、数据源、数据成员以及有关格式设置是否启用的信息创建绑定，并将该绑定添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: The property given by <paramref name="propertyName" /> does not exist on the control.
trans-unit.target: 在该控件中不存在由 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 给出的属性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The property given is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: 给定的属性为只读属性。

trans-unit.source: If formatting is disabled and the <paramref name="propertyName" /> is neither a valid property of a control nor an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用格式设置，且 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 既不是有效的控件属性，也不是空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control property to bind.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定的控件属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the data source.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据源的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The property or list to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定到的属性或列表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to format the displayed data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要格式化显示的数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Creates a binding that binds the specified control property to the specified data member of the specified data source, optionally enabling formatting, propagating values to the data source based on the specified update setting, and adding the binding to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建将指定控件属性绑定到指定数据源的指定数据成员的绑定，同时可选地启用格式设置，根据指定的更新设置将值传播到数据源，并将该绑定添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>方法引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The property given by <paramref name="propertyName" /> does not exist on the control or is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 给出的属性在该控件上不存在或者为只读。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified data member does not exist on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源中不存在指定的数据成员。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The data source, data member, or control property specified are associated with another binding in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数据源、数据成员或控件属性与集合中的另一个绑定相关联。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control property to bind.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定的控件属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the data source.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据源的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The property or list to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定到的属性或列表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to format the displayed data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要格式化显示的数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: When the data source has this value, the bound property is set to <see cref="T:System.DBNull" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据具有此值，则绑定属性设置为 <see cref="T:System.DBNull" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a binding that binds the specified control property to the specified data member of the specified data source, optionally enabling formatting, propagating values to the data source based on the specified update setting, setting the property to the specified value when <see cref="T:System.DBNull" /> is returned from the data source, and adding the binding to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建将指定控件属性绑定到指定数据源的指定数据成员的绑定，同时可选地启用格式设置，根据指定的更新设置将值传播到数据源，当从数据源返回 <see cref="T:System.DBNull" /> 时将该属性设置为指定的值，并将该绑定添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>方法引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The property given by <paramref name="propertyName" /> does not exist on the control or is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 给出的属性在该控件上不存在或者为只读。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified data member does not exist on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源中不存在指定的数据成员。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The data source, data member, or control property specified are associated with another binding in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数据源、数据成员或控件属性与集合中的另一个绑定相关联。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control property to bind.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定的控件属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the data source.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据源的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The property or list to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定到的属性或列表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to format the displayed data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要格式化显示的数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: When the data source has this value, the bound property is set to <see cref="T:System.DBNull" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据具有此值，则绑定属性设置为 <see cref="T:System.DBNull" />。

trans-unit.source: One or more format specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个格式说明符，指示如何显示值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a binding that binds the specified control property to the specified data member of the specified data source, optionally enabling formatting with the specified format string, propagating values to the data source based on the specified update setting, setting the property to the specified value when <see cref="T:System.DBNull" /> is returned from the data source, and adding the binding to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建将指定控件属性绑定到指定数据源的指定数据成员的绑定，同时可选地以指定的格式字符串启用格式设置、根据指定的更新设置将值传播到数据源、当从数据源返回 <see cref="T:System.DBNull" /> 时将该属性设置为指定的值，并将该绑定添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>方法引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The property given by <paramref name="propertyName" /> does not exist on the control or is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 给出的属性在该控件上不存在或者为只读。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified data member does not exist on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源中不存在指定的数据成员。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The data source, data member, or control property specified are associated with another binding in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数据源、数据成员或控件属性与集合中的另一个绑定相关联。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control property to bind.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定的控件属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the data source.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据源的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The property or list to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定到的属性或列表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to format the displayed data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要格式化显示的数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: When the data source has this value, the bound property is set to <see cref="T:System.DBNull" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据具有此值，则绑定属性设置为 <see cref="T:System.DBNull" />。

trans-unit.source: One or more format specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个格式说明符，指示如何显示值

trans-unit.source: An implementation of <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> to override default formatting behavior.
trans-unit.target: 重写默认格式设置行为的 <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Creates a binding that binds the specified control property to the specified data member of the specified data source, optionally enabling formatting with the specified format string, propagating values to the data source based on the specified update setting, setting the property to the specified value when <see cref="T:System.DBNull" /> is returned from the data source, setting the specified format provider, and adding the binding to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建将指定控件属性绑定到指定数据源的指定数据成员的绑定，同时可选地以指定的格式字符串启用格式设置、根据指定的更新设置将值传播到数据源、当从数据源返回 <see cref="T:System.DBNull" /> 时将该属性设置为指定的值、设置指定的格式提供程序，并将该绑定添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>方法引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The property given by <paramref name="propertyName" /> does not exist on the control or is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 给出的属性在该控件上不存在或者为只读。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified data member does not exist on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源中不存在指定的数据成员。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The data source, data member, or control property specified are associated with another binding in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数据源、数据成员或控件属性与集合中的另一个绑定相关联。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a binding to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将绑定添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent" /> the binding collection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取绑定集合所属的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent" /> the binding collection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 绑定集合所属的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.BindableComponent%2A> property returns the same object as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.BindableComponent%2A>属性返回与相同的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Control%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of any bindings.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合的所有绑定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs when the collection is cleared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged>事件发生时清除集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Clear%2A> method to clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> for each control on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Clear%2A>方法来清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>为窗体上的每个控件。

trans-unit.source: Clears the bindings in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合中的绑定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control that the collection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取该集合所属的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that the collection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 该集合所属的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints information about the control that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打印控件有关的信息，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>属于。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> 的默认 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property is used in cases where a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> without a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> specified is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A>在情况下使用属性其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>而无需<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A>指定添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value for Windows Forms controls is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode.OnValidation>
trans-unit.target: Windows 窗体控件的默认值为 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode.OnValidation>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property on the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 该数据绑定控件的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> specified by the control's property name.
trans-unit.target: 获取由控件的属性名指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> that binds the specified control property to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的控件属性绑定到数据源的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: If the specified property does not match a binding in the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Item%2A> returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的属性不匹配的绑定在集合中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Item%2A>返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例返回单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中删除指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中移除特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The example gets the required <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Item%2A> property, and removes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例获取所需<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Item%2A>属性，并删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Remove%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="binding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="binding" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 删除指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the removal succeeds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged>如果删除成功，则会发生事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.Count%2A> property to determine whether the index is within the range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.Count%2A>属性来确定索引是否是集合的范围内。

trans-unit.source: If so, the third <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果是这样，第三个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>中删除。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> value is less than 0, or it is greater than the number of bindings in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 值小于 0 或大于集合中的绑定数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从该集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified binding from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除指定的绑定。

trans-unit.source: The binding belongs to another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 该绑定属于另一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection" />。
